channel.title: MarcScape 718 STAFF OPEN / 24-7
channel.description:
[center]
[size=20pt][b] MarcScape 667/721[/b][/size] [/center]
[center]
Features: QBD KBD Kalph Skills all working Dungeoneeering GE without the sell Custom Polypore Dungeon Full Jadinko Lair Corp Nex Godwars Full Barrows Glacors Bork Dag Kings Jad Warriors Guild Duel Custom Hararken boss Multi Area Lv 12 Wildy Pk Mage Bank Fight Pits West Pk East Pk Edgeville Prestige System Vote System with 3 different kind of rewards and Epic Vote store NEWEST Items of RS like Dragonbane armor Flamming Skull etc. Tons of pets in-game Working Dungeoneering, Hunter, Summoning. Chaotics Steadfast, Ragefire, Glavien Boots ::cmd to open up commands page. [/center]
[center] Working GE for buying items [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/hry9dx.png[/img]
Jadinko lair [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/152j8qv.png[/img]
Polypore dungeon [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/15gt5cm.png[/img]
QBD [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/vxgkjl.png[/img]
One of the many pets, vulture! [img]http://puu.sh/OKDo.jpg[/img]
[/center]
[center] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/x5w4fzn9nu9a526/MarcScape%20Client.zip][font=impact][size=24pt][u][b]DOWNLOAD CLIENT[/b][/u][/size][/font][/url]
ENJOY[/center]
